text:
As India launches the world's largest #vaccination drive, we take a look at Anant Phadke's review of  Katherine Eban’s ‘Bottle of Lies: Ranbaxy and the Dark Side of Indian Pharma,’ a New York Times bestseller. #COVID19 #vaccine
Read the full book review.
https://t.co/0VxJ3mPX21 https://t.co/tkMrPGVasD
